columns.Student_Answer_ID: The unique identifier for each student answer submission.
columns.Valid_Answer_ID: The identifier linking to the valid answer for the assessment.
columns.Student_Answer_Text: The text input provided by the student as their answer.
columns.Satisfactory_YN: The indication of whether the student provided a satisfactory answer.
columns.Assessment: The evaluation rating of the student's answer.

Student_Assessments.table_description: The table records student answers and their assessments for evaluations.

columns.Student_ID: The unique identifier for each student in the database.
columns.First_Name: The first name of the student for identification.
columns.Middle_Name: The middle name of the student for identification.
columns.Last_Name: The last name of the student for identification.
columns.Gender_MFU: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Student_Address: The residential address of the student.
columns.Email_Adress: The email address used for communication with the student.
columns.Cell_Mobile_Phone: The mobile phone number of the student for contact purposes.
columns.Home_Phone: The home phone number of the student for additional contact.

Students.table_description: The table records essential information about each student enrolled.

columns.Question_ID: The unique identifier for each question in the database.
columns.Type_of_Question_Code: The code representing the format of the question.
columns.Question_Text: The text content of the question posed to students.

Questions.table_description: The table stores questions used in assessments for students.

columns.Exam_ID: The unique identifier for each exam listed in the database.
columns.Subject_Code: The code representing the subject of the exam.
columns.Exam_Date: The scheduled date and time for the exam to take place.
columns.Exam_Name: The name given to the specific exam for identification.

Exams.table_description: The table maintains details about various exams offered to students.

columns.Exam_ID: The unique identifier for the exam linked to the questions.
columns.Question_ID: The unique identifier for the questions associated with the exam.

Questions_in_Exams.table_description: The table links questions with their respective exams for assessments.

columns.Valid_Answer_ID: The unique identifier for each valid answer option provided.
columns.Question_ID: The identifier linking to the question associated with the valid answer.
columns.Valid_Answer_Text: The text of the valid answer option for the corresponding question.

Valid_Answers.table_description: The table stores valid answers linked to specific questions for assessments.

columns.Student_Answer_ID: The unique identifier for each student's answer submission.
columns.Exam_ID: The identifier linking to the exam associated with the answer.
columns.Question_ID: The identifier linking to the question related to the answer.
columns.Student_ID: The unique identifier for each student providing the answer.
columns.Date_of_Answer: The date and time the student submitted their answer.
columns.Comments: The remarks or notes about the student's answer submission.
columns.Satisfactory_YN: The indication of whether the answer was satisfactory.
columns.Student_Answer_Text: The text input provided by the student as their answer.

Student_Answers.table_description: The table records students' answers along with evaluations and comments.
